value.name: Show No More Tears
value.overview:
Kumiko Goto gives a passionate performance as a heroine who searches for her mother while being torn between love and hate!

Midori was born in Quebec, abandoned by her mother as a baby, and raised in a convent. Now a tarento and actress, she discovers that her mother's initials were K.K. and begins searching for her, eventually narrowing the field down to one of Kaori, Kiyomi or Kayo.
